"No...!": "I grew tired of our little game, so I decided to make things more interesting."
"I imagined you would make an appearance eventually, but you were quite slow."
"I believe I have cleaned up all of the rubbish I could find."
"Refuse that scuttles about is rather annoying. It is about time we finish cleaning."
"<%me>! Matoi! The enemy forces are gathering! Hurry and retreat!"
"You must be the guardian of this planet. I do not know where you have been hiding all this time, but are you to be my next opponent?"
"...Impressive. They are rather quick to flee."
"Varuna will be displeased with me if I am not thorough in my cleaning."
"Invaders in The Land of Black and White"
